channel.title: Anyone interested in running a ps-tut site? (2)
channel.description:
Anyone wanna run a ps tutorial site? I currently have 2 I dont use anymore since I have 2 new ones....
one only has a few pages in it, you can delete and make the way you want it.
other comes with.. smf forums topsite and you can change template to what ever.
if you wanna run it post and tell me if you have any experiance. what you will need to run it.
I will include 1 ftp account"for you" with total acces of all dictionaries
both domains have ps in the name so it will be for photoshop, and one has tuts, and other has tutorials so there both identical.
tutorials- only has html pages tuts- smf,topsite"aardvrk"

item.title: Anyone interested in running a ps-tut site? (2)
item.dc:creator: @solemage2 solemage2
item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

lol, I was just offering them, since I dont even use them anymore… I am designing a template site at the moment.

Read full topic
